thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Gourmet Master says annual dividend payment for 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gourmet Master says annual dividend payment for 2017
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Gourmet Master Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to use undistributed profit to pay cash dividends of T$6 per share to shareholders for 2017
* To use undistributed profit to distribute stock dividend worth T$0.04 for every one share
* To use additional paid-in capital to distribute stock dividend worth T$1 for every one share
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/AasCkG
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
